DescriptionData.Title: Pride Socks - Childrens MixMatched Rainbow Striped Athletic Socks
DescriptionData.Description: 10" tube socks are sized for babies and small kids up to 5 years of age. The rainbow striped tube socks will run thigh high for newborns/infants and mid to knee high for small kids. One sock has stripes of red, orange, yellow and the other has stripes of green, blue and purple. 75% Ring Spun Cotton, 14% Nylon, 7% Acrylic, 4% Spandex. Made in the USA.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: 10" socks is sized for babies and small kids up to 5 years of age. 14" socks are recommended for kids between the ages of 5 and 10
Perfect for use as leg warmers as well as athletic socks
One sock has stripes of red, orange, yellow and the other has stripes of green, blue and purple
75% Ring Spun Cotton, 14% Nylon, 7% Acrylic, 4% Spandex Made in the USA
